BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_description: Next js Boilerplate is the perfect starter code for your project. Build your React application with the Next.js framework.

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Privacy.meta_description: Our privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
Privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our services.
Privacy.collection_content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, subscribe to our services, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.
Privacy.use_content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to comply with legal obligations.
Privacy.sharing_content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with service providers who perform services on our behalf, or when required by law.
Privacy.security_content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction.
Privacy.rights_content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also have the right to object to or restrict certain processing of your data.
Privacy.contact_content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@example.com.

Terms.meta_description: Terms and conditions governing the use of our services.
Terms.heading: Terms of Service
Terms.intro: By accessing and using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
Terms.acceptance_content: By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.
Terms.use_content: You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
Terms.restrictions_content: You may not: (a) modify or copy the materials; (b) use the materials for any commercial purpose; (c) attempt to reverse engineer any software contained in the service; (d) remove any copyright or proprietary notations from the materials.
Terms.termination_content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including breach of these Terms.
Terms.limitation_content: In no event shall we be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
Terms.changes_content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page.
Terms.contact_content: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@example.com.

Cookies.meta_description: Information about how we use cookies and similar technologies.
Cookies.heading: Cookie Policy
Cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website.
Cookies.what_content: Cookies are small pieces of text sent to your web browser by a website you visit. A cookie file is stored in your web browser and allows the service or a third-party to recognize you and make your next visit easier and the service more useful to you.
Cookies.use_content: We use cookies to understand how you use our service and to improve your experience. This includes personalizing content and advertising, providing social media features, and analyzing our traffic.
Cookies.types_essential: Essential Cookies: Required for the operation of our website.
Cookies.types_analytics: Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
Cookies.types_functional: Functional Cookies: Enable personalized features and remember your preferences.
Cookies.types_advertising: Advertising Cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements to you.
Cookies.control_content: You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Please note that removing or blocking cookies can impact your user experience and some functionality may no longer be available.
Cookies.browser_content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. However, limiting cookies may impact your experience of our website.
Cookies.contact_content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at privacy@example.com.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.
SignIn.helper: Pick your preferred provider below or use email and password.
SignIn.credentials_helper: Use the email and password you created for this account.
SignIn.hero_subheading: Access dashboards, manage your projects, and pick up where you left off in seconds.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.
SignUp.helper: Choose GitHub, Google, or create a classic email and password login.
SignUp.credentials_helper: Set a password and you will be able to sign in without a social provider.
SignUp.credentials_error_taken: An account already exists for this email.
SignUp.credentials_error_generic: We couldn't create your account. Please try again.
SignUp.hero_heading: Create your account in less than a minute
SignUp.hero_subheading: Choose a social provider or create classic credentials. You can always link more providers later.

Dashboard.alternative_message: Want to build your SaaS faster using the same stack? Try <url></url>.
Dashboard.greeting_subtitle: This is your hub for projects, metrics, and upcoming work. Everything stays in sync across devices and themes.
Dashboard.quick_actions_subtitle: Jump straight into what matters next.
Dashboard.action_new_project_desc: Kick off a fresh idea in minutes with best-practice templates.
Dashboard.action_view_docs_desc: Look over integration notes and deployment guides.
Dashboard.action_open_settings_desc: Manage team access, billing, and security policies.
Dashboard.manage_account_title: Manage your account from one place
Dashboard.manage_account_subtitle: Keep your billing details, team access, and security policies aligned with how your product grows.
Dashboard.manage_account_point_billing: Update payment method, download invoices, or change plans in Stripe Billing.
Dashboard.manage_account_point_profile: Edit profile information and connected identity providers in seconds.
Dashboard.manage_account_point_security: Review device logins and enable passwordless authentication for your team.

UserProfile.heading: Account details
UserProfile.description: Review the information we receive from your connected identity provider.

DashboardBilling.missing_customer: We couldn't find billing information for this workspace yet.
DashboardBilling.not_authenticated: Please sign in to manage billing.
DashboardBilling.generic_error: Unable to open the billing portal right now. Try again in a few moments.

DashboardPayments.label: Buy credits
DashboardPayments.title: Top up usage-based credits
DashboardPayments.subtitle: Choose a credit pack that suits your workload. Credits never expire and apply instantly.
DashboardPayments.note: Need a larger package or custom billing? Reach out to our team and we can tailor a plan for you.
DashboardPayments.generic_error: We couldn't start the checkout session. Please try again.
DashboardPayments.error_unauthenticated: Please sign in to buy credits.
DashboardPayments.error_validation: That credit package is no longer available.
DashboardPayments.error_stripe: Stripe rejected the request. Check your billing details and try again.
